entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 2:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4 except minus 16 over northern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 except minus 16 over northern sections. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
